title: Black Screen after pressing "LAUNCH" on League of Legends.....
body:
I have tried everything. It happened randomly too. I played a game, quit the client, later on tried to play again and that happened.

I uninstalled the app. Reinstall, nothing. 
I repaired the client. Nothing.
I deleted the airclient folder from file location, nothing.
I made sure firewall is disabled.
I am literally stuck. 

What should i do?!

replies.body:
It sounds like there are other potentially problematic network configurations that could prevent your client from properly reaching the Login service. To address these possibilities, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any of those steps resolve this.

Let me know if you continue to see this issue.
